meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of zoospores.
meanings.sent1: The zoosporic algae moved swiftly in the water.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the zoosporic growth under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The zoosporic creatures had a dance party in the pond.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination was a zoosporic whirlwind of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The zoosporic nature of the organism fascinated the students.

meanings.sent1: The zoosporic plant released tiny swimming spores.
meanings.sent2: The zoosporic process was crucial for the organism's reproduction.
meanings.sent3: The zoosporic garden sprinkler watered the plants with spores.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a zoosporic factory of new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The zoosporic ability of the organism amazed the researchers.
